rows.label: tlk006301_07_msg0001
rows.name:
King Eulogimenos believed in the Driver
of the Heaven's Holy Grail and in Your Highness.

rows.label: tlk006301_07_msg0002
rows.name:
He believed that you would surely
recover the Heaven's Holy Grail.

rows.label: tlk006301_07_msg0003
rows.name:
I am glad to see that his faith
has been rewarded.
